entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
